website_summaries.verdict: Designed for adventure, this rugged charger works for a variety of electronic devices.
pros: We love this charger's ability to hold up in rugged environments that may include dirt, rain, and other elements
Dust and water-resistant for up to 3'
Easy to take along as well
cons: Some found that it stops charging after just several months of use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am an ARMY infantry Veteran and gear up for week long excursions with my Eagle kayak. I do not pamper my equipment but don't abuse it either, however, this power pack charges faster on my solar panel than others. I leave the light on of the FOS all night so as to see what critter is in camp, and does not go below one dot. (out of 4). I am considering buying another. The only thing I wish was improved was the ability to utilize a "magnetic connector" so as not to wear out the USB week link. (see-picture above).
customer_reviews.author: Outback buck

customer_reviews.title: Water proof and strong case.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a little before writing my review because I wanted to test it on the field. Three days on camping out of grid. I put it in the water, in the mud in the dust. I dropped it many times from three feet on terrain (not rocks). It worked perfect and charged full my old samsung 7 three times. But I could charge a fourth. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: Great for active people
customer_reviews.text: If you want a battery extender for the office, there are a number to choose from. But for camping, biking or going to an amusement park this is the battery extender you want. It clips on your belt, charges your phone 2-4 times, durable and water resistant. The first one I had lasted 3 years and we use it very often as my husband and son are boy scouts and camp.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Konkel

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of charge;  ergonomic shape;  works in the heat.
customer_reviews.text: I took it on an 8 hour hike in 100 degree temperatures and it worked exactly as advertised. It charged my iPhone probably twice over the course of the day. I was able to fit it and the phone together in a small fanny pack while it was charging the phone. The rounded edges helped it fit in the pack. I like the feel of it in my hand. I often to use it for biking in case my phone battery gets low or I have to charge my bike headlight or taillight.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Power bank not re-charging after 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great for the first 6 months but now it won't re-charge past the first charge light, therefore I am lucky to be able to recharge my phone once. Used to be able to charge atleast 3-4 items before I needed to re-charge this powe bank. I have used the cord that came with it and a couple of others as well, no luck.
customer_reviews.author: amazonprincess

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is on the road every day, and who works in some very dirty, dusty environments. He LOVES this device. It's reliable, sturdy, and holds up to light rain, dirt, dust, mud, heat and cold. It's exactly what we needed. This charger is so awesome I just couldn't get myself to buy any other model. I purchased a second one of these for myself. They are wonderful for travelling. Since we go out in our RV so much it's great to have along just in case.
customer_reviews.author: NanaB

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight Stuck on - drains battery
customer_reviews.text: I've had this unit for about 8 months. Worked perfectly up till last week when I turned on the flashlight, and it would not turn off. Let the flashlight drain the battery completely multiple times, but every time when I plug it in to charge the flashlight just comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not For NOte 8
customer_reviews.text: It says it was correct for the Samsung Note 8. It is not. Charger connection does not fit slot on phone. Returned. Also, wall charger not supplied! You can only charge from your laptop! Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B. Drayson

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite External battery
customer_reviews.text: I am an Iphonographyer and often shoot for four to eight hours a day. I generally run through my iPhone X battery after 2-3 hours on regular shooting mode. I’ve hooked up this battery for six more hours of shooting. This battery not only allows me to shoot for over eight hours, my phone is also fully charged after shooting. It’s also shock resistant if you drop it. Then after three hours, the external battery is recharged and ready for using again the next day....love, love, love this external battery.
customer_reviews.author: Click Chick

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: So I hike out in the cold a lot and I find that my phone battery drops much quicker in these conditions, thus the need for a secondary power source. During yesterday's hike I found the need for more power and luckily I had purchased this unit and had in fully charged in my pack. I simply ran the cord to my phone and kept on hiking, and before long a had finished my hike and had almost a full charge on the phone... great product. The only reason I gave it a four instead of five rating was for the weight on the unit, that may not be fair but it does weigh a little more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Given

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item. I bring it deep woods camping.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Small and durable. Have not put it to the water test so can’t attest to that. I originally bought it to take deep woods camping and discovered that it works. Found that I now have it in my car and also bring it biking with me by leaving it in my biking backpack. Liked the first one I purchased so I bought two more and gave one to my 17 year old son. He lost his with in the first 30 days so now he uses one of mine. Grrrrr....
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid  waterproof impact proof construction, battery life could be better. Good pricing.
customer_reviews.text: Recent purchase, used 3 x so far. Solid, well made little unit. I like the waterproofing and armoring, seems like it could withstand significant impact. I gave it 4 stars because the battery life is relatively short and charge time is a bit slow. It charged my iPhone from starting at 30% to 75 % on its full charge and then died. As an emergency or travel unit I can see it’s use, but as an extended power outage back up unit, not so much. Price is competitive for a mid range e battery.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Power on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I travel alot and it's so convenient to charge a phone or tablet on the road or plane. I love the flashlight at night so I dont bother other passengers. I have dropped this in water and snow. It's been in sand and mud Its great It is a little on the heavy side, I was surprised by the weight of it and it does take a while to fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Gensman

customer_reviews.title: Fospower power charging Bank
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the 4th power charging device for very long but it seems to recharge my Samsung S7 very quickly. The phone was down to about 70% power and in about 38 minutes it was recharged to 100% with no indicator lights on the Falls power charging Bank changing the Status. In other words it appeared in and not diminished it's power charge enough to reduce the light indicators.
customer_reviews.author: Majanie

customer_reviews.title: works well so far, seems VERY solid.
customer_reviews.text: so far... I'm impressed. solid little guy. it is heavy and not something for your pocket. good for travel bag, camping etc. bringing mine on my boat to charge my phone if I get stranded. Wish it had cable built in like my other one. maybe next version will have this. if this thing dies I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Durability has held up with multiple falls. Can't speak to the waterproofing because it hasn't gotten gotten very wet. It can charge my Google Pixel up to two full charges when it's fully charged. Smaller electronics I can charge a good amount. The caribeener is great to strap to your bag when packpacking etc
customer_reviews.author: Pooh

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE DON’T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. Horrible battery, I charged it the whole way up, and it only lasted me for one single charge for my phone and it died after that, I’ve been trying to charge it and it takes forever and does not go up even a bit. HORRIBLE. I bought this for a festival and it served me for nothing. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours researching powerpacks. Settled on this one because it appeared to be the most durable....wrong! The power pack worked well for about 2 months. Then for no apparent reason it quit. The 4 battery life indicators stay locked on and pack wont charege anything. It actually discharged my phone! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: charger works great
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this charger, so I can't say anything about longevity or battery life. However, within a couple of days of its arrival our power went out. My cell phone battery was so low that it wouldn't stay on, so I used my new charger. Within a short time my phone was fully charged i am happy with this product and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bessie first time customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for traveling used it during a camping trip I ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for traveling used it during a camping trip I have also used it in my car I am having a problem with my fuse I haven't had time to take my car to the dealership... charging my iPad and iPhone works great but the charging cord was not part of the purchase but I had an extra cord .... love love this product
customer_reviews.author: Christina hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: We used it on a safari trip to South Africa and wanted something we could use in rough conditions. I worked just fie. We had to charge it right out of the box, but after that a nightly charge was all it needed. We used it to charge 2 I-Phones without problems. It was nice that we could use the I-phone cords and not have to mess with the 220v power conversions. It is a simple device and we didn't have a trouble with it. A next version might have the ability to plug directly into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Spoerke

customer_reviews.title: Great product, this is the second one I bought!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this power bank to have on hand during bad weather, power outages. I have since been traveling a lot and take this along with me to keep my phone charged. Loved it so much just bought my daughter one. It charges your phone quickly and it has a lot of extra features. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Incredible charging power
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my mountain retreat when I was away for 5 days and 4 nights. I cannot believe how fast it charges my iphone 6 which needs a new battery anyway. I loved it. I think this portable charger charges faster and better than had I plugged it into an outlet. I'm very happy at the compact size and cannot wait to use it on hikes. I only used it twice to recharge my phone and it did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Holds Charge, Recharges quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and durable power bank! I've got 2 since I thought I lost one. Charged mine back up after I got home from a week long event. Left it in storage for an entire YEAR. Brought it back out again this year, and it's still FULLY charged! Easy to attach to my bike without being in the way. The bank recharges quickly and recharges my phones quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't recharge, internal battery life is useless
customer_reviews.text: Got this and charged the unit up. Used this to charge my phone 3x and now cannot recharge the FoolsPower. It stays at 1 blinking light trying to recharge the FoolsPower unit. Better off buying rechargeable batteries and a battery charger with an Output built in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I dont like it. I want to return it because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont like it. I want to return it because I just used it recently after purchasing it a month ago and it didn't even charge my phone it kept it at same percentage and then later it just started to lower the percentage of my phone battery.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Castello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Holds a charge for longer than I anticipated. I took a two and a half week trip. I used the charger throughout the 21 hour travel time there, several times during the trip and the 21 hour journey home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! took it on a 5 day backpacking trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! took it on a 5 day backpacking trip on Supai, AZ. I was able to get intermittent cell reception the entire week to check progress of work projects. Clients didn't even know I was gone. I turned it off at night and had plenty battery life all week. It was ideal for my situation and worked flawlessly. The only complaint is that the LED light is really stupid and weak, but I would not buy this type of product just for the led light.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while then it just stopped working. It still charges itself and the flashlight still works but it won't charge my phone or tablet anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Alvidrez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is perfect for my me. I can use it to charge my dying phone 3x before it rana out of juice. The only thing is I s bulky and has weight, also the port cover is hard to open. Sometimes I'm worried I'll chip my manicured nails lol but other than that this product is awesome. It's so tough that I'm not afraid if I drop it or get it wet. I totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: LadyBeesai

customer_reviews.title: Bummer. 👎
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a backpacking trip and very occasionally as a phone and jbl speaker back up, which was rare. I don’t know how many charges I got but it suddenly stopped working. Lasted 7 months but probably less than a dozen charges. Bummer. Thought it’d last longer.
customer_reviews.author: c.jahelka

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a huge asset in a household full of electronics. Great for on the go. Holds a charge well and can charge 2 to 3 electronic devices before it needs to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable for all things outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for camping and now use them for all occasions. I've taken these fos powers to family get togethers and on the river. When paddling my canoe the last thing I want to worry about is ruining my things because of water. These power banks have dropped in puddles, in the beach, the sink and have bounced off my hip and various counters. They still work great. I've had them for a year now and they still charge my galaxy note 9 twice on a single charge. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Vogel

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the adventurer !
customer_reviews.text: wow, what a cool little gadget, this thing can charge your phone multiple times on one charge of the device. has a bright built-in l.e.d. light, a compass and water tight flaps that snap shut and make this charger the ultimate camping, fishing (i got it for being out on the boat) and survivalist must have ! it's well worth the price and shipped in a nice bubble-envelope with it's own box. makes a great gift too ! harry
customer_reviews.author: hari sono

customer_reviews.title: Slow charge
customer_reviews.text: I charged my phone overnight using this charger and my phone was only around 84% when I woke the next morning. Otherwise, this product is great. Definitely looks and feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: BrokeAss Bish

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 6 months?! Say it ain’t so
customer_reviews.text: I used this charger for work as I’m on my phone quite a bit, so it was consistently used however not in any harsh conditions it brags to be able to withstand. However after 6 months of use it won’t take a charge anymore. Perhaps this is what to expect at the price point, but I have a mophie battery pack that’s going on 7 years that still holds a charge. I’ve had to resort back to it in light of this ones failure. Wouldn’t recommend if you want something you’ll have for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Eastin

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again and again!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these for my husband, myself, and my family. I have only had 1 bad one which they replaced immediately!!!!!! Best device in the world! Charges iPhones quickly and about 3-4 times before needing a charge!!!! LOVE THIS CHARGER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I liked it because it was waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I could just clip it on my backpack & not worry about it until I needed it. I liked it because it was waterproof, had a clip, and had a flashlight. I have not tested the waterproof-ness. It is very hard to open. The flashlight is a tiny light not really worth being called a flashlight. The clip works great and it will be a back up to my other charger. It does not charge very quickly but it does charge.
customer_reviews.author: tangointx

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging itself (broke) after only a month....
customer_reviews.text: Overall it has been a good portable charger. The durability is and roughness I personally liked. The flashlight was a good addition and was really happy with my purchase until it stopped charging. I’ve only had the product for a month and a few days and it just stopped charging. I tried different wires and wall sockets and it won’t charge. It had a good performance but I am very disappointed that it broke after just a month....so if that is how these are, I would not recommend getting this charger. Maybe look for other alternatives that have a guarantee longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Keep the original charger as it wont charge with any cable, but it is an excellent item to invest in and can get several charges. The only downside for this is, it takes a min if you have two phones which may need to charge at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Darrio McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty tough so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've only had to charge it twice in 2 months, and I've used it about a dozen times to re-charge my iPhone. I haven't used it to get a full charge, but it definitely will give me enough to get me through the rest of the day. Feels really solid. LED hasn't really been tested. but it has taken the abuse of the bottom of my backpack, and shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C Wright

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a more expensive unit with this so the hubby could use it mt biking and kiteboarding. He LOVES it. It is smaller than the other unit as well so it fits more easily into his pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini

customer_reviews.title: Batting .333
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three over the past year. One did not charge from the beginning so I returned it. The second lasted 11 months then would not charge. The third is still going strong. We use them frequently as we like to camp. Very rugged and will charge an iphone several times over.
customer_reviews.author: GGamboa

customer_reviews.title: powers gopro 10 hours
customer_reviews.text: great little battery. The ribbed case makes it easy to zip-tie to things. I use it for filming fishing trips all day with my gopro... runs 10 hours which is plenty.
customer_reviews.author: ZachMac

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trip to Egypt, Jordan, and Israel since I figure I'd be out exploring all day. Small, sturdy, convenient to carry. Charges my phone faster than an outlet. I like this thing..
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I bought this about a year and a half ago for my emergency prep stuff. I pull it out all the re-chargeable stuff every 3 months and this time around the fosPower refuses to charge past the first bank of lights. I've tried charging from the computer and the wall plug. No help. Not sure where to go from here. Hopefully I don't just have to take the loss.
customer_reviews.author: oseph4

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this product is sturdy and holds a good charge, and has worked well for the past year and is still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charged once, refuses to recharge ever again
customer_reviews.text: Was really great the first time I used it, charged it all of the way up and took it on a weekend camping trip that charged two phones and a headlamp to completion. Unfortunately, the battery refuses to recharge now anytime I plug it in. It'll just stay plugged in for hours, blinking. Was really looking forward to using this more than once but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to shop on Amazon from my deer blind
customer_reviews.text: Battery life seems to be very good so far. I can keep my phone charged while surfing from my deer stand and the meter still shows full. On the down side being able to shop while bored in a stand is costing me a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: AtomicDog

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend and he loved it. He's end of the world preparation, out doorsy type. A bit bulky but the protective case around it is worth it being so. Not sure how big of an impact it could withstand but does the job for going camping or exploring. Would recommend for anyone wanting a sturdy battery pack for going on an adventure with.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Navy Chick

customer_reviews.title: Works great and holds a charge for a long time (weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and holds a charge for a long time (weeks to greater than a month!) Easy to use. Cover closes securely. I have not tried getting it wet but would not be afraid to take it out in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: marksports

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Should have gotten one a long time ago. Holds charge for a long time, even in the cold. Charges phone fast!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered one for a family member post tornado damage Nashville Tn. Works as described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: The light isn't much to write home about, but as a portable charger, this is worth is weight in gold. It's saved me a lot of frustration and hassle. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea hogan

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work just fine, my only concern is when they go ‘you have a lifetime warranty!’ And then while you read more it goes ‘and by warranty we mean if it comes broken, don’t damage it yourself man, can we will not replace it’. Then they go on to ask for numbers that you were not given. All in all, it’s a cheap external battery, don’t expect to be paying for gold when you’re getting gold colored rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Best battery pack I have
customer_reviews.text: This is the best battery pack I have to date. I have put this thing through the ringer from extremely cold weather to over 100 degree heat. I work in a barn so this thing gets dropped a lot especially in areas where most people will not even go near (the barn gutter). There has been no change to how long this battery life lasts and charging time is always consistent. This is my go-to battery pack 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It is heavy duty and is great for taking anywhere with you. I also love the flashlight. Very bright! The size is great too, I have tiny hands and it's not too big or bulky to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: No charging cord
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a charging cord gave it as a gift can’t figure out how to charge it
customer_reviews.author: ceddie56

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: I am ordering my second one today because the original one went through the wash. It charges faster than the outlet and I get about 2 1/2 full charges out of it. Great for vacations or camping.
customer_reviews.author: Independant

customer_reviews.title: Work great to begin with
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, one quit taking a full charge after a year with very little use.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Heywood Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: When I plug the portable charger into the outlet to charge it, it takes way too long to charge it. I had it plugged in since yesterday and it is still charging...
customer_reviews.author: Generation_Z

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I can charge my iPhone 7 to 100% 4 times without charging the power bank again
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer Bolivar Pérez Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Really hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: Fast charging and really holds a charge. I can charge my phone on it 2-3 times from 5% battery before charging this product. Love it. Took it camping over the weekend, used it once or twice and three weeks later it still had juice to charge my phone again. Great item!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Levins

customer_reviews.title: Rugged built!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the opportunity to try out yet, but so far, love everything about it... Rugged exterior, sturdy hook, quick charge!!! Quick shipping and very well priced! Going to give it a workout this weekend, I do not expect to be disappointed! Very pleased! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Hatton

customer_reviews.title: FosPower PowerActive 10200 mAh
customer_reviews.text: Good price Don’t last as long as described but good enough Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Melmac

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Use for Disney and as a travel agent I recommend all my clients to use this item on their packing list. Last All day in the parks
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Things that make you go hmmmm.
customer_reviews.text: I turned the flashlight on, and it won't turn off. Seems pretty useless as a power bank if the light is slowly draining battery life. I have tried to contact Fospower, just waiting to hear back. I probably will return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stork

customer_reviews.title: This is great - just don't let your wife borrow it.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I love the size and rugged look and feel. I had a small cheap battery backup and I would always lose it and it barely helped add charge. This thing charged my phone without a problem. But there is a down side: I let my wife borrow it when she had to fly for a weekend trip and now she won't give it back.
customer_reviews.author: L. Colby

customer_reviews.title: They need to made it last longer
customer_reviews.text: It does not last very Long, it stopped working a week ago , I was very sad Not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Stief

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane Preparation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a hurricane. In my opinion everyone should have one for natural disasters. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Was more than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is portable, easy to carry with phone and purse. But have tested it and appreciate the battery life and easy use. I have had to spend alot of time with family in hospital. Always searching for outlets or chargers. Nurses are terrific about finding me one. But now I will have my own and leaves that one open for others who have to stay longer and make more calls than normal. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Truely waterproof/resistant
customer_reviews.text: I love this battery. It is rugged and water-tight. I use it as an EDC device, so I always have power on hand. The only complaint is the compass. It stopped working shortly after I received the battery. While it looks like a nice touch, it is a useless extra item. I will buy another one when my current one dies, if they are still available in what I trust will be years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Settecase

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack with long life
customer_reviews.text: Great little power pack, I love this thing! It has come to my rescue on at least a half a dozen occasions. It has great battery life. Great for charging my phone with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: DWT

customer_reviews.title: Solid build. Use it for hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid. I’ve taken it out hiking and just clip it to my bag. Has lasted a couple of phone charges without having to recharge the battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: I bought two. One of which I still have ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One of which I still have. The other was given to a friend. Just after 30 days, it died. My guess is it overcharged itself. He left it plugged in charging for over 8 hours when it was close to full. Mine is still kicking around and is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great powerpack!
customer_reviews.text: Powerhouse of a powerpack. Love having this so much I bought one for my daughter. Power outage? No problem. ..will charge your phone quickly. Like the flashlight, hope I never have to seriously use the compass but happy I have it. Sturdy, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Normared

customer_reviews.title: great for camping
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time camping -- it's durable and reliable!
customer_reviews.author: christal

customer_reviews.title: Great, handy charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger works great, I usually get about 4-5 charges of my phone before I need to charge it up again. It's very handy to have in situations where you aren't able to charge your phone with a conventional wall charger. It is great to travel with too because of it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and fast
customer_reviews.text: This charges better than the car and wall, fast and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Marie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: not working as they advertise
customer_reviews.text: it took about 3 hours to charge my phone from 9% to 21% that is not practical and they said it will work for camping!!!!! first of all also it took 6 hours to charge the battery 80%. big size....and do nothing
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed A Hegazy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great , love that it lasts a long time will charge an iPhone from 1-100 in less than 2 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for a month or so for keeping my phone charged at work. I have to do 72 hours in the woods at a time and this bank is only half depleted. It has survived being thoroughly soaked and dropped several times. Good piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Saper

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have used it everyday since receiving it and I have charged it only once in 10 days. It is a bit heavy, but that doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife Up Close

customer_reviews.title: Quality with a peace of mind when on the road or camping!
customer_reviews.text: This power bank is built extremely well and very durable! It also has a larger10200 mAh storage capacity which is a big plus when on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great buy... door is a little hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I can get 2-3 charges on my Samsung S5. The bottom door is a little hard to open, but it has the outdoor protection needed. After a few openings it seemed to get better. I bought a few of these for gifts after I used it. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie F

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I travel with a volunteer disaster Relief agency and there isn’t always power when we are first in to a disaster area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought for my son and he loves it. Flashlight is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have a complain. Your ad shows that the storage battery is specially suitable for iPhones. If you are claiming this then you have included a lightning charging cable. You can take a charge for it . When an iPhone owner buys the product he/she would definitely expect an iphone charging cable to be included with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anjan

customer_reviews.title: Rough and Ready Charger --- there must be better designs out there.
customer_reviews.text: It works but it could be a lot better. The cover over the cord connections is very difficult to open. The compass doesn't work. And the instructions were scanty at best. Once you figure everything out, it works fine, except for the cover. They could have done a lot better. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and reliable
customer_reviews.text: A great charger. Its rugged and reliable, and will charge your phone at least 2-4 times depending if you just let it sit and charge.
customer_reviews.author: vegasdad

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping/outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, great for camping. Rugged and heavy duty. Charges my S9+ 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: only reason I gave it 4 stars is because there ...
customer_reviews.text: only reason I gave it 4 stars is because there were no instructions sent with my order. It does charge your iPhone, but the charge doesn't last as long as a normal charge from a wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I sent this back but it was a great item. the rubber casing made it hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back but it was a great item. the rubber casing made it hard to get in and out of my purse. I realized i really did not need a charger to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn C.

customer_reviews.title: Tough and long-lasting.  Perfect for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.text: Still using this after a summer full of 14,000-foot peaks. It has been exposed to rain, sleet, dew, drops onto rocks, and lots of use. Still working great. This single unit has kept us going for three days straight, with charge left over. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for hubby. He's working the actual holiday so we celebrated early, great portable battery.
customer_reviews.author: PinkMandi

customer_reviews.title: looks indestructible and charged our phone when needed
customer_reviews.text: Returned from a trip outside the USA, charged our two phones no issues. Its portable and not so heavy, looks like you can run a truck over it. Glad I have it,
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it work great, but customer service is wonderful as well. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I got it to use while traveling around Europe for 3 weeks and it worked great!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it!!! I chose this over a smaller version because I didn't know how often I was going to be near a source for recharging. I was very pleased with the length of the battery life, however, it did take awhile to recharge. All-in-all, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Cornell

customer_reviews.title: It will charge 2 devices FULLY. Then I recharge it to 4 lights.
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability of the case The lid closure is a +++ . Its durable as well and cloes well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Leilani

customer_reviews.title: It works as described
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. However, the flashlight cannot be used under rainy conditions. This is because it is housed within the cover and its waterproof capability will be compromised if it is opened. The flashlight is not the reason why I brought this battery, so it is not a huge issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack
